recipes.name: Chicken Legs with Braised Peas and Onions
recipes.description: Description: Full of flavor and boasting several rich colors, this recipe for chicke legs will quickly become your go-to meal when you want something hearty and delicious. You can easily serve this recipe with a fresh green salad and slices of bread for a meal that is satisfying and filling.
recipes.ingredients: Ingredients: 4 large 10-12 ounce chickens, 2 tablespoons olive oil, Handful of thyme sprigs, 1 garlic clove, 1.5 tablespoons butter, 2/3 cups of water, 2 tablespoons butter, 7 ounces pearl onions, Few more thyme sprigs, 4 cups green peas, 2/3 cups water, 1 romaine heart

recipes.name: Linguine with Lemon, Feta, and Basil
recipes.description: Description: The light and zesty flavor of this pasta dish makes it ideal for the summer. It's also quick and easy for supper during the week, because you are likely to have the ingredients on hand.
recipes.ingredients: Ingredients:  1 pound fresh linguine, 1/4 cup of olive oil, Grated zest and juice of 1 lemon, 1/3 cup of grated Parmesean, Handful of fresh basil leaves, 7 ouces of Feta cheese crumbled, 2 tablespoons pine nuts

recipes.name: Clams with Bacon
recipes.description: Description: This first course is a regular feature on pub menus. Serve with crusty bread on the side to soak up the savory juices.
recipes.ingredients: Ingredients: 4.5 pounds littleneck clams, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 8 ounces slab bacon cut into 1.5 inch thick chunks, Few thyme sprigs, Splash of dry white wine, Squeeze of lemon juice (optional)

recipes.name: Deep Dish Chicken Pie
recipes.description: Description: Similar to chicken pot pie; a savory dish of chicken, vegetables, and gravy surrounded by a cripsy crust, this chicken recipe is the perfect thing to comfort after a long day.
recipes.ingredients: Ingredients: 3.75 cups of chicken stock, Thyme sprigs, 3 skinless boneless chicken breasts(about 1.25 pounds total), 10 ounces pearl onions or shallots (peeled), 7 ounces button mushrooms (cleaned), 2 tablespoons butter, 1/3 cup all purpose flour, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 1 pound basic short pastry, 2 extra large egg yolks lightly beaten, 1 tablespoon water for egg wash, Coarse salt for sprinkling

recipes.name: Chocolate Swirl Cheesecake
recipes.description: Description: Elegant as can be and filled with plenty of chocolate, this dessert is for anyone with a sweet tooth. Best advised to make the night before your event.
recipes.ingredients: Ingredients: 1.5 cups of crushed graham crackers, 3 tablespoons ground toasted almonds, 4 tablespoons unsalted butter melted, 3/4 cup sugar, 1 cup sour cream, 1.25 pound of cream cheese, 2 extra large eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
